name: Sorrow (CreateDev Games)
description:
Sorrow is about a veteran's daughter, Anne, who searches an attic for items that relate to her father's service in World War One.

When interacting with these items, you are transported into her father's shoes. Throughout the game, explore, contribute to the war effort and relive the harsh conditions of a WW1 soldier on the front line.

Complete objectives to progress and learn about the perception of war in Britain during the 1930s.

Created for the IWM War Games Jam 2023.

Duration: 1 Week

Collection Item (Inspiration): White Poppy

Warning: Contains themes of war and conflict. User discretion is advised.
